author: Richard H
title: The Greatest of Them All
text:
My families and I have two days to stay in Waldorf-Astoria Beijing. I have to say this is the greatest hotel not only about its hardware but also about its software. We have wonderful breakfast and dinning experiences in the restaurant. The assistant manager, Ms Stephanie Wu, was so thoughtful for our needed, especially we have two children and not easy to control. She has patient to take care about them and understood what they needs. We felt free and easy under hospitality. Besides, Duty Manager, Mr. Charlie Peng, also give my son his personal gift and he feel very happy until now. I would like to give my spherical thanks to Ms. Stephanie Wu and Mr. Charlie Peng. You and your hotel gave us an wonderful memory in Beijing. We will choose Waldorf-Astoria Beijing again for future. The comment "The greatest of them all" on Waldorf-Astoria Beijing is true.
